name: STELLAR LUMINOSITY
description:
STELLAR LUMINOSITY is a small puzzle game where you BOOST from ORBIT to ORBIT and reach the SPACE STATION. Play through 18 different levels.

Each level you've a limited amount of jumps you can make so make sure you timed it right. Try to avoid the dangerous asteroids or to hit nothing at all and fly off in the emptiness of space..THIS GAME WAS MADE IN 48 HOURS DURING THE KENNEY JAM 2021:
Kenney Jam 2021
